name: Equinox Army
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE!Welcome to Equinox Army! This is a classical Defender-Game:
Build & Research Spawners. Fill up the ammunition by walking over the respective Spawner.
You let enemies pass - you lose spawners. Reach the enemy spawner side with your projectile to destroy their spawners eventually.

Start with the Tutorial-Mode if this is your first time. 

CONTROLS:

Move your Builder/Refiller: Arrow Keys.

Research / use UI: Left Mouse Button.
